title: Devan's Story: Blue Hydrangeas
description: Devan Scott is a middle school art teacher who finds herself suddenly single, jobless, and in search for meaning in her life. She moves from Austin, Texas to Vancouver, Washington and discovers more than she had bargained for. Her life and subsequent coming out journey is entertaining, charming, and sometimes a little scary. This is Devanâ€™s story.
author: J.J. Wallingford
